body_html: @7oud You may need to reset your session. Try tf.Session.reset() before starting the second session. I have a couple of C++ versions and some could be bit outdated, for later versions you can also try tf.contrib.estimate.RunConfig to specify GPU memory fraction.
body_text: @7oud You may need to reset your session. Try tf.Session.reset() before starting the second session. I have a couple of C++ versions and some could be bit outdated, for later versions you can also try tf.contrib.estimate.RunConfig to specify GPU memory fraction.
body: @7oud You may need to reset your session. Try `tf.Session.reset()` before starting the second session. I have a couple of C++ versions and some could be bit outdated, for later versions you can also try `tf.contrib.estimate.RunConfig` to specify GPU memory fraction.
